title: Anonymous Commuter Id
description: Anonymized identifier for flow monitoring. Includes an origin and destiny property to map its path.

type.description: Property. NGSI entity type. It has to be AnonymousCommuterId

date.description: Property. Date of the detected anonymous identifier.

orig.description: String value of origin id, last entity where the anonymous id was detected.

dest.description: String value of destination id, actual entity where the anonymous id was detected.

source.description: String value of source of this AnonymousCommuterId, eg. (ALPR, People Monitoring, Face Recognition, etc...)

algorithm.description: Name of the algorithm used to anonymize the Id
